snippet.title: Horned Knight Upcoming Indie Game Trailer w/ Gameplay | Switch, Ps4, Xbox One, PC
snippet.description:
Subscribe for more game trailers 👉 http://bit.ly/mustachegamer

Horned Knight is a challenging 2D action-platformer where you must overcome all fears, enemies, and traps as the Hero Knight. Rewrite destiny, with your trusty sword, young Knight - the realm depends on it! 

#HornedKnight #Action #Indie

⭐ The most anticipates games coming out in 2021: https://youtu.be/Ju3oIIqAv6Y

Follow us 👇
